title: Blackberry Torch "Haze Theme"

Like
Haze is a Plus+ theme: efficient, gorgeous, clean, fast and organized.

Haze is the latest addition to our dashboard theme family. A new generation of themes that allow you to have faster access to your most important apps by providing a better interface dressed to impress.

Feature packed, Haze takes your current icons and conveniently prioritizes them at the top in a beautiful coverflow system. A prominent clock makes it very easy to see the time even at the quickest glance. Tons of customizable icons and Today previews in a beautiful skin make Haze one of the most productive themes out there.

Haze has all of the right ingredients:

Haze is the Plus+ theme that practically runs itself.

* No landscape support.
